comment.author: 22334021@N03
94482242@N00
comment._content:
The paddle steamer leaving Penarth pier is almost certainly one of P&A Campbell's "White Funnel Fleet" which did trips around the Bristol Channel.

One of their vessels, the Waverley, still does day trips in the summer from the pier.

comment.author: 56118141@N00
comment._content: An amazing photo, I was here just a short while ago, really great to see this, I'll show it to my son, he will love it....

comment._content: According to the Vale of Glamorgan council website the pavilion was built in 1907.
